arts.ttl: European football: Ndoye’s backheel means Napoli miss chance to close gap
arts.sum: Second-placed side pegged back to 1-1 by stunning flick Valladolid players sorry for Sunday’s altercation on bench Napoli missed the chance to narrow the gap at the top of Serie A after a 1-1 draw at Bologna, with André-Frank Zambo Anguissa’s first-half goal cancelled out by a moment of magic from the hosts’ Dan Ndoye. With leaders Inter only managing a draw at Parma on Saturday, Napoli had a chance to close on them, but they remain second with 65 points, three behind. Bologna are fourth on 57 points. arts.ttl: Serie A Preview: Bologna vs Napoli – Team News, Line-ups & Prediction
arts.sum: Stadio Renato Dall'Ara forms the backdrop for a high-stakes Serie A encounter between top-four hopefuls Bologna and title-bidding Napoli. Both teams will be out to put three precious points on the board and get closer to achieving their seasonal goals.
